Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a pale-red pottery wine-jar, the fabric is brown-grey in section, the exterior is covered with a cream-coloured slip and remains of two lines of black-painted hieratic text identifying the contents as year 16 wine.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393528) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393528)
